s.text: "At first I considered the gratuitous sample I was given was a kind of a nasty trick, until I tried P.E.P. I can not describe depict how satisfied I am with the effect I got from using the remedy for 2 short months.

"At first I considered the gratuitous sample I was given was a kind of a nasty trick, until I tried P.E.P. I can not describe depict how satisfied I am with the effect I got from using the remedy for 2 short months.
Well here comes the true stuff not a fictitious one!
Well here comes the true stuff not a fictitious one!
Pay heed to what people tell about this stuff:
Finally the real thing - with no trim!
